fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem party institutionalization index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: To what extent are political parties institutionalized?
name: e_v2xps_party_3C /_4C /_5C
